 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פֶּחָר‎</span> **noun masculine** ==potter== ( = <abbr title="transliteration"><u>pa——âr</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פַּחָר‎</span> (also ***clay***), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; probably loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pa—aru***</u></abbr>, ***potter***, compare [[BDB#Brock|Brock]] [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>Buhl</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פ‎</span> [[Dan.2.41|Dan 2:41]].
